senses.sense_definition: A chronic eating disorder characterized by a binge-and-purge cycle involving extreme overeating followed by self-induced vomiting.

examples.text: Many young people struggle with <w>bulimia</w> due to intense social pressure to be thin.
Doctors treat <w>bulimia</w> with a combination of psychological therapy and nutritional counseling.

senses.sense_definition: A condition of excessive, insatiable hunger.

examples.text: The patient's sudden <w>bulimia</w> was a symptom of a deeper metabolic issue.
He experienced a strange <w>bulimia</w> that made him want to eat constantly despite being full.
